objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Horror lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about health and fitness using neutral register
Students create original horror themed content about health and fitness in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Horror story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in horror context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within horror theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
